text: {{Infobox settlement | name = Middle Franconia | native_name = Mittelfranken | native_name_lang = de | settlement_type = Regierungsbezirk | image_map = Locator map RB Mittelfranken in Bavaria.svg | map_caption = Map of Bavaria highlighting Middle Franconia (district) | coordinates = | coor_pinpoint = | coordinates_footnotes = | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = Germany | subdivision_type1 = State | subdivision_name1 = Bavaria | established_title = | established_date = | extinct_title = Disestablished | extinct_date = | seat_type = Region seat | seat = Ansbach | area_total_km2 = 7245.70 | population_footnotes = | population_total = | population_as_of = | population_density_km2 = auto | website = regierung.mittelfranken.bayern.de | official_name = | image_flag = Flag of Middle Franconia.svg | flag_size = 150px | image_shield = Mittelfranken Wappen.svg }} Middle Franconia (, ; Main-Franconian: Middlfrangng) is a government region in the Free State of Bavaria. The seat of government is Ansbach. In the area of this region are the cities Nuremberg, Fürth, Erlangen. == Cities and districts == This shows the cities and districts (Landkreis) of Middle Franconia. ===Independent cities=== * Ansbach * Erlangen * Fürth * Nuremberg * Schwabach ===Districts=== * Ansbach * Erlangen-Höchstadt * Fürth * Neustadt (Aisch)-Bad Windsheim * Nürnberger Land * Roth * Weißenburg-Gunzenhausen ==References== Category:Bavaria
title: Middle Franconia
